page.title: 10RESIDENT OF HAREWOOD HOUSE
page.content:
One of the residents of Harewood House is a dinner lady at Gateways School,who also does a little cleaning on the estate grounds.She has lived on the Harewood estate for five and a half years because of her husband's job as a bird keeper in the bird garden there.She enjoys the wonderful surroundings and small,friendly community,but dislikes the insecurity of knowing that her home depends upon her husband's job.Her home is also very public.
She and her family enjoy walking in the House's gardens and watching T.V. Favourite programmes include nature documentaries and soap operas like "Dynasty".She loves knitting,and,with her husband photography.She uses local shops as she does not enjoy shopping in either Leeds or Harrogate.
